item.title: Plz help
item.dc:creator: @kyle kyle
item.description:
@kyle wrote:

The Un-Named:

If it dosen’t mine the rock and someone else dose it still add’s 1 to rocksmined.

thats easily solved by adding
repeat
wait(100)
until (not(findcolorspiral,rockcolor,3,3,550,550))

item.title: Plz help
item.dc:creator: @kyle kyle
item.description:
@kyle wrote:

If you need any more help with anything… pm me!

firstly dont use bitmap they are very unreliable and 99% of the time u dont need them. Also use an include for the procs get my include at grundor.com
an edited version of your mining point out the lines i changed :

procedure mining;
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,RockColor,5,5,514 ,337,5))
then
begin
movemousesmooth(x,y)
wait(800+random(100))
clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(3000+1000)
rocksmined:=rocksmined+1;
end;
end;

Read full topic

item.title: Plz help
item.dc:creator: @maleficus maleficus
item.description:
@maleficus wrote:

my powerminer finds the rock no problem but it won’t click, I’ve changed the tolerance from 5 to 15 but it still doesn’t work, so edit my script if you want but please point out what i did wrong

[code]{_________________________________________________________________________
| /’_/\ /\_ \ /'___\ __ | |/\ \ __ \//\ \ __ /\ \__//\_\ ___ __ __ ____ | |\ \ \__\ \ /'__\ \ \ \ /’\ \ ,__\/\ \ /'___\/\ \/\ \ /',__\ | | \ \ \_/\ \/\ \L\.\_ \_\ \_/\ __/\ \ \_/\ \ \/\ \__/\ \ \_\ \/\__,\ |
| \ _\ _\ _/._/_\ _\ _\ \ _\ _\ _//_/ |
| // ////////// // //// // // |
|____________________________________________________________________ |
}

 ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//                    :SCRIPT CREATED BY MALEFICUS:                      //

// PLEASE CONTACT MONKEY_POO22@HOTMAIL.CO.UK IF YOUR’RE HAVING ANY //
// PROBLEMS //
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// IGNORE THIS //
program Malfspowerminer; //
var rocksmined,x,y,mine:integer; //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// UPDATES AND VERSIONS //
// //
// + V 1.1 very simple will become much //
// more user friendly soon //
// //
///////////////////////////////////SETUP//////////////////////////
const //
rockcolor=2503250; //
///////////////////////END OF SETUP LEAVE ME ALONE/////////////
procedure mining;
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,RockColor,5,5,514 ,337,5))then
movemousesmooth(x,y)
wait(1000+random(500))
if(FindBitmapToleranceIn(mine,x,y,6,6,126,23,1))then
begin
getmousepos(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(3000+1000)
rocksmined:=rocksmined+1;
end;
end;

procedure loadbitmaps;
begin

mine := BitmapFromString(17, 17, ‘z78DA8D945BAE83300C44B794’ +
‘40797D4213F6BFA4AB99B1746DB941F8FC5068ECF12BA5D02AF1F’ +
‘62107917DC944F4ACAFFEEC4264FEAC82EC204499896C25DE9207’ +
‘1FAB6EA03C9BD7D6898FA2E81BD1FB46467A46AAE8B9EDA0AFC0D’ +
‘ECB9B6AA51713E827C8DE7213ECAB6A4EBB27D068132D57584ADA’ +
‘0282DA5146A9EFBD81B612FE3071AC555F807D658A59494EA6AE2’ +
‘0946D07E6876ADB0DFA87CCA01145B4633BA81308112FE28D9537’ +
‘B507B02E308A6A684A2A6817B0C9CFBBF0945CB18AB1BF5EA73F2’ +
‘BFF2117793BC19B5C4CF917545AF0B380BE01EBFE49467B215276’ +
‘5631F53DEFB55B2629F1DB64AAB4538F33D6367202D3A0F9BCFEB’ +
‘1289C8170578CEE105F37D6FF2E4013359263F37681E0CD6DEE8F’ +
‘58F91E70FFB769F71E520DEB01C254CF209C9A1D2F36373CB3BF6’ +
‘156938660795AD4007F4A0595E95E52AFF3C4FEB8CE5E9BBBF142’ +
‘B5B553C9FF1FE2025FD9’);

end;
begin
loadbitmaps;
repeat
mining
writeln(’ __ ‘);
writeln(’ //\ __ | |/ |/ ___ _ __ _____ _____ _ __ ‘);
writeln(’ / \ / ` | | | / __| | _ \ / _ \ \ /\ / / _ \ __|’);
writeln(’/ //\ \ (| | | _ _ \ | |) | () \ V V / / |’);
writeln(’/ /_,||| |/ | ./ _/ _/_/ __||’);
writeln(’ ||’);
writeln(’ ‘);
writeln(’ _ __ ___ ()_ __ ___ _ __ ‘);
writeln(’| _ _ | | _ \ / _ \ __|’);
writeln(’| | | | | | | | | | / |’);
writeln(’|| || |||| ||_|_|’);
wait(1000)
writeln(‘this script was bought to you by maleficus’);
writeln(‘mined ‘+inttostr(rocksmined)+’ rocks so far’);
until(false)
end.[/code]
